slogan: Feel the touch of spring and traditions
aboutp1: The big festival of traditions, music, and spring! We create the Mărțișor atmosphere with a new twist: designer items, workshops, the largest immersive show, artist performances, and vibrant activities for everyone. Enjoy white and red Moldovan wine, immerse yourself in music and celebration, feel part of the event, and discover authentic Moldova and its culture. Spring in the rhythm of Moldova!
showText: In our immersive show, every viewer becomes part of the story. With special devices, you will be able to feel the real scents of spring flowers, blooming trees, and traditional Moldovan sweets. Special effects enhance your senses, creating full immersion. Live characters, light and smoke magic, music combining folk motifs and modern rhythms create a unique emotional experience. Be part of the national legend!
artistsDay1P1: Romanian folk-hip-hop where traditional motifs meet modern beats.
artistsDay1P2: Moldovan ethno-fusion bringing traditional music to life through rock and alternative.
artistsDay2P1: Live folk instruments and modern hits in national arrangements create an unforgettable festive atmosphere.
artistsDay2P2: Popular singer with soulful lyrics and modern sound, loved by millions.
activityDay1P3: 14:00 – Musical parade of favorite heroes (for kids)
activityDay2P4: 14:30 – Flueraș (orchestra) – live folk instruments and modern hits in national arrangements
barZone: White and red wine — a symbol, and wine installations as art. For classic lovers, for every taste: alcoholic and non-alcoholic.
foodZone: Placinte, sarmale, mititei, grilled meat, cheeses, local delicacies, and soft drinks. Moldovan cuisine reinterpreted as modern street-food. For the little ones – ice cream and sweet treats.
fairZone: Designer clothing with national motifs reimagined, handmade ceramics and wood items, artisan chocolate, accessories, natural cosmetics made from grape extracts, and favorite wines. We promise a new format for traditional fairs.
sittingZone: A place to relax and enjoy tasty food and your favorite drink with loved ones.
kidsZone: Multiple kids' zones with animators and games let children fully experience the festive atmosphere.
masterClassZone: Workshops for children and adults: pottery, painting on national shoppers, and making natural cosmetics from grape extracts. Hands-on experience, creativity, and authentic materials make workshops a bright part of the festival.
reasons1: The largest immersive show about Mărțișor where the legend comes to life through light, music, scents, and full immersion.
reasons2: Free entry for everyone – a celebration open to anyone who wants to truly feel spring and Moldova.
reasons3: Authentic celebration in a modern format: Moldovan traditions reimagined through design, music, and atmosphere.
reasons4: Live music and artists blending folk motifs with modern rhythms, creating the atmosphere of a true celebration.
reasons5: Lots of tasty national food and unique Moldovan wine
